name: Where's my kingdom?!
description:
Move your units with your mouse, attack enemies with left click and (re)conquer tiles with space bar. 

Red tiles are in intruders' possession and you need to reconquer them to gain them back, white are neutral and the fastest to conquer and blue ones are yours.

The bar above soldiers' heads are their health bars and when they die, there's a chance you'll enslave an intruder and make him fight for you!

Controls

Mouse movement - move your units around

Left mouse button - attack

Space bar - (re)conquer current tile.

If you want to rate my game you can click here.
